page.title: 20IMPROVEMENTS-D.WHITE,H.SCOTT
page.content: AFTER A DISCUSSION WITH MY FRIEND WE AGREED THAT THERE SHOULD BE A FEW MORE SHOPS NEAR BY.ALSO THE VILLAGE COULD BE IMPROVED BY SWIMMING POOLS OR A LEISURE CENTRE WHICH INCLUDED TENNIS. THERE SHOULD BE AT LEAST ONE BANK IN THE AREA TO SAVE GOING TO ILKESTON.THE ROADS COULD BE IMPROVED BECAUSE THEY BIG POT-HOLES IN THEM,AND ARE IN A TERRIBLE STATE.ANOTHER IDEA WE CAME UP WITH WAS THE LACK OF CAR SPACE NEXT TO THE CRICKET GROUND. { ADVANTAGES IN THE VILLAGE.} ONE OF THE ADVANTAGES IS THAT WE HAVE A LOT OF FARMLANDS AND COUNTRYSIDE.ONE OF THE IMPROVEMENTS IS ALREADY TAKING PLACE AT SCARGILL PRIMARY SCHOOL.THE IMPROVEMENTS ARE FOUR:NEW CLASSROOMS AND A NEW CHANGING ROOM TO COPE WITH ALL THE NEW CHILDREN THAT ARE COMING TO SCHOOL NEXT TERM.
